context:
Moldovan Footballer of the Year
Year | Player | Team | Position
--- | --- | --- | ---
1992 | Spiridon , Alexandru Alexandru Spiridon | Zimbru Chișinău | Midfielder
1993 | Curtianu , Alexandru Alexandru Curtianu | Zimbru Chișinău | Midfielder
1994 | Cleșcenco , Serghei Serghei Cleșcenco | Zimbru Chișinău | Forward
1995 | Testemițanu , Ion Ion Testemițanu | Zimbru Chișinău | Defender
1996 | Rogaciov , Serghei Serghei Rogaciov | Olimpia Bălți | Forward
1997 | Testemițanu , Ion Ion Testemițanu | Zimbru Chișinău | Defender
1998 | Curtianu , Alexandru Alexandru Curtianu | Zenit St. Petersburg | Midfielder
1999 | Epureanu , Sergiu Sergiu Epureanu | Zimbru Chișinău | Midfielder
2000 | Cleșcenco , Serghei Serghei Cleșcenco | Maccabi Haifa | Forward
2001 | Rogaciov , Serghei Serghei Rogaciov | Saturn Ramenskoe | Forward
2002 | Cebotari , Boris Boris Cebotari | Zimbru Chișinău | Midfielder
2003 | Covalciuc , Serghei Serghei Covalciuc | Karpaty Lviv | Midfielder
2004 | Covalciuc , Serghei Serghei Covalciuc | Karpaty Lviv | Midfielder
2005 | Covalciuc , Serghei Serghei Covalciuc | Spartak Moscow | Midfielder
2006 | Rebeja , Radu Radu Rebeja | FC Moscow | Midfielder
2007 | Epureanu , Alexandru Alexandru Epureanu | FC Moscow | Midfielder
2008 | Bordian , Vitalie Vitalie Bordian | Metalist Kharkiv | Defender
2009 | Epureanu , Alexandru Alexandru Epureanu | Dinamo Moscow | Midfielder
2010 | Epureanu , Alexandru Alexandru Epureanu | Dinamo Moscow | Midfielder
2011 | Suvorov , Alexandru Alexandru Suvorov | KS Cracovia | Midfielder

wiki_section_title: Players of the year

wiki_section_text: 

intro: Moldovan Footballer of the Year is an annual award to Moldovan footballer, organized by Football Association of Moldova.

qa.question: Who signed the first defender to have won the Moldovan Footballer of the Year award ?

nq_272813_24.Query Analysis: The query asks for the identity of the person who signed the first defender to have won the Moldovan Footballer of the Year award.
nq_272813_24.Query Keywords Extraction: signed, first defender, Moldovan Footballer of the Year award
nq_272813_24.Answer Analysis: The answer is Tony Pulis, indicating he is the person who signed the first defender to have won the Moldovan Footballer of the Year award.
nq_272813_24.Document Content Analysis: The document appears to be a list of players with their nationalities, positions, and transfer details. It mentions a defender, Celestine Babayaro, who moved to Newcastle United.
nq_272813_24.Document and Query Keywords Matching: The document mentions a defender (Celestine Babayaro) and a transfer detail (to Newcastle United).
nq_272813_24.Document and Answer Keywords Matching: The document does not mention Tony Pulis.
nq_272813_24.Key Information Matching: The document provides information about a defender (Celestine Babayaro) but lacks details about the Moldovan Footballer of the Year award or the person who signed him.
nq_272813_24.Can the Document Answer the Query: No, the document does not provide information about who signed the first defender to have won the Moldovan Footballer of the Year award.
nq_272813_24.Can the Document Help Infer Additional I: No, the document does not provide any additional context or information related to the Moldovan Footballer of the Year award or the signing details.
nq_272813_24.Explanation: The document is irrelevant to the query as it does not provide any key information about the Moldovan Footballer of the Year award or the person who signed the first defender to have won it. The mention of a defender (Celestine Babayaro) is not sufficient to infer any relevant information about the query.
